serverAddress.description: the address of the snapcast server in the form IP:PORT

devices.description: the snapcast devices to be controlled by snapcast-multiroom

id.description: the snapcast id of the device

preferredName.description: the preferred name for the device (will be set by snapcast-multiroom)

groups.description: the snapcast devices to be controlled by snapcast-multiroom

devices.description: which devices are in the group

zones.description: the zones to be controlled by snapcast-multiroom

id.description: the id of the stream - generally the name set in the stream uri

stream.description: the stream to be created for the zone e.g. librespot:///usr/bin/librespot?name=<stream_name>&devicename=<zone_name>&bitrate=320&volume=100&normalize=false&autoplay=true
